name: Removal and imitation of dog tags
text: §143-5  Removal and imitation of dog tags.  It shall be unlawful for any person to remove any tag from any dog not owned by the person or under the person's control, or to place on any dog any license tag not issued as herein provided, or to make or have in possession or to place on a dog any counterfeit or imitation of any license tag provided for in this chapter. [L 1941, c 268, §5; RL 1945, §7155; RL 1955, §156-5; HRS §143-5; gen ch 1985]
